name: StroyCord/D-Key Bot - Music Bot for discord
description: A discord bot to play music on discord's VC

BOT_TOKEN.description: The token of your bot discord.

USER_ID.description: The id of the user you want to see when he logs out.

VOICE_CHANNEL_ID.description: The id of the voice room you are checking.

CHANNEL_ID.description: The id of the salon where you want to send the message.

XIAOMI_SONG.description: Boolean. if True: Activate the NE command for playing Xiaomi 11 Lite NE Song.

TRIGGER_PREFIX.description: Single Character. The prefix with which you intend to use the bot (e.g. to trigger commands).
